def rearrange_sum(s: str) -> str:
    numbers = s.split('')
    sorted_numbers = sorted(numbers)
    rearranged_sum = '+'.join(sorted_numbers)
    return rearranged_sum

def rearrange_sum(s: str) -> str:
    numbers = s.split('+')
    sorted_numbers = sorted(numbers)
    rearranged_sum = ''.join(sorted_numbers)
    return rearranged_sum
